name: ForgeMC
description: The Forge server software for Minecraft: Java Edition.

installScript.script: cd /mnt/server && VER=$(curl -s https://files.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/promotions_slim.json | grep -oP '"latest":\s*"\K[^"]+' | head -1) && curl -sLO https://maven.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/$VER/forge-$VER-installer.jar && java -jar forge-$VER-installer.jar --installServer && mv forge-*-universal.jar server.jar
